author: Phil Vickery
method: Preheat the grill to the highest setting. Place the scallops in their shells. Sprinkle the scallops with the cayenne pepper and polenta and place a lime slice on top of each. Place the scallops under the grill for 3-4 minutes, until cooked through. Sprinkle with the mint and Tabasco sauce, to taste. Drizzle with a squeeze of lime and serve immediately.
ingredients: 3 scallops, cleaned, shells retained,  cayenne pepper, to sprinkle,  1 tbsp polenta,  3 lime slices,  1 tbsp chopped fresh mint ,  splash Tabasco sauce,  squeeze lime, to serve
